atk-s0519a:777_2: Idameva hi ñāṇaṃ bhagavato pavattaṃ “mahāvajirañāṇa”nti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:777_3: Taṃ pana sasambhāraṃ katvā dassento “tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyā dhammā”ti āha.
atk-s0519a:777_4: Mohajālappadālananti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena avijjābhavataṇhānaṃ padālanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:777_5: Atītādibhedabhinnesu rūpādīsu sakaattabhāvādīsu ca saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā.
atk-s0519a:777_6: Tassā hi taṇhā jālinī sibbinī jālanti ca adhivacananti.
atk-s0519a:777_8: avijjātaṇhā vibhajitvā yathānusandhinā saṃkilesapakkhaṃ nigamento “tena vuccati pubbā koṭi na paññāyati
atk-s0519a:778_4: Diṭṭhicarito hi tapojigucchādinā anupāyenapi yebhuyyena kilesānaṃ sallekhanādhippāyena carati,
atk-s0519a:778_5: tasmā so sāsane pabbajito dhutadhammavasena sallekhapaṭipadaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0519a:778_7: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti so visujjhamāno paññādhiko hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a:778_9: Taṇhāvasena micchāvimokkho hotīti taṇhācarito visujjhamāno saddhādhikova hoti,
atk-s0519a:778_12: Diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāyātiādi paṭipadāniddeso heṭṭhā desanāhāravibhaṅge āgato eva,
atk-s0519a:779_2: Dandhañca dhammaṃ ājānātīti taṇhācaritassa mandapaññassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:780_0: “Ye hi kecī”tiādinā tāsaṃ paṭipadānaṃ niyyāne tīsupi kālesu ekantikabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:780_1: Tattha imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhīti imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi,
atk-s0519a:780_5: Atha vā catukkamagganti nandiyāvaṭṭassa catuddisāsaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ.
atk-s0519a:780_6: Tā pana catasso disā disālocananaye āgamissanti.
atk-s0519a:780_10: Rattavāsiniyāti rattesu rāgābhibhūtesu vasatīti rattavāsinī, tassā.
atk-s0519a:780_13: Ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dve disā samathavipassanānaṃ
atk-s0519a:780_14: vasena vodānapakkhepi dve disā catusaccayojanā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānatāya bhūmīti.
atk-s0519a:781_1: Evaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmiṃ niddisitvā idāni tassa disābhūtadhamme niddisantena yasmā cassa disābhūtadhammesu
atk-s0519a:781_3: tasmā “veyyākaraṇesu hi ye kusalākusalā”ti disālocanalakkhaṇaṃ ekadesena paccāmasitvā “te duvidhā upaparikkhitabbā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:783_0: Taṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabbanti ce?
atk-s0519a:783_8: Te kattha daṭṭhabbāti te pana vipallāsā kattha passitabbāti āha –
atk-s0519a:783_13: Tesu kāraṇabhāvena purimasiddhā kilesā parato paresaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato kilesāpi kilesavatthu.
atk-s0519a:783_15: ayonisomanasikāraparikkhatā ca dhammā kilesuppattihetubhāvato kilesappaccayāpi kilesavatthūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:784_0: Cattāro āhārāti ettha āhārasīsena tabbisayā kilesāpi adhippetā.
atk-s0519a:784_2: “Paṭhame āhāre”tiādinā dasavatthuke kilesapuñje purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:784_3: Tattha paṭhame āhāreti visayabhūte paṭhame āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:784_5: Paṭhame vipallāseti paṭhame vipallāse appahīne sati paṭhamaṃ upādānaṃ pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:785_1: Idāni dasavatthukaṃ kilesapuñjaṃ taṇhāvijjāvasena dve koṭṭhāse karonto “yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:785_2: Tattha kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ phassāhārañca aparijānantassa taṇhācaritassa yathākkamaṃ kāyavedanāsu tibbo chandarāgo hoti,
atk-s0519a:785_3: iti upakkilesassa chandarāgassa hetubhāvato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0519a:785_6: Tathā manosañcetanāhāraṃ viññāṇāhārañca aparijānanto diṭṭhicarito tesu attasaññī niccasaññī ca hotīti
atk-s0519a:785_7: vuttanayeneva te diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesāti vuttā.
atk-s0519a:785_8: Tathā purimakā dve vipallāsā purimakāni eva ca dve dveupādānayogaganthāsavaoghasallaviññāṇaṭṭhitiagatigamanāni
atk-s0519a:785_9: taṇhāpadhānattā taṇhāsabhāvattā taṇhāvisayattā ca taṇhācaritassa upakkilesāti vuttā.
atk-s0519a:785_10: Pacchimakāni pana tāni diṭṭhipadhānattā diṭṭhisabhāvattā diṭṭhivisayattā ca diṭṭhicaritassa upakkilesāti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:786_1: Kabaḷīkāre āhāre “asubhe subha”nti vipallāsoti catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkāre āhāre catūsu ca vipallāsesu
atk-s0519a:786_2: “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso daṭṭhabbo kabaḷīkārāhārassa asubhasabhāvattā asubhasamuṭṭhānattā ca.
atk-s0519a:786_3: Tathā phassāhārassa dukkhasabhāvattā dukkhapaccayattā ca visesato tattha “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso.
atk-s0519a:786_9: Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyatīti “asubhe subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī kilesakāmena vatthukāme daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a:786_10: Idaṃ vuccati kāmupādānanti yaṃ tathā kāmānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:786_12: “Dukkhe sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “sīlabbatehi anāgate bhavavisuddhīti taṃ nibbutisukha”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a:786_13: “Anicce nicca”nti vipariyesaggāhī “sabbe bhavā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā”ti saṃsārābhinandiniṃ bhavadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a:786_16: so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti attadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “dutiye vipallāse ṭhito”tiādinā.
atk-s0519a:787_0: Ayaṃ vuccati kāmayogoti yena kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmupādānena vatthukāmehi saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a:787_2: Ayaṃ vuccati bhavayogoti yato sīlabbatupādānasaṅkhātena bhavupādānena bhavena saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a:787_4: Ayaṃ vuccati diṭṭhiyogoti yāya ahetukadiṭṭhiādisaṅkhātāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0519a:787_5: sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiavasiṭṭhadiṭṭhiyā ca satto dukkhena saha saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a:787_7: Ayaṃ vuccati avijjāyogoti yāya attavādupādānena sakalavaṭṭadukkhena ca saha satto saṃyojīyati,
atk-s0519a:788_0: Yasmā pana kāmayogādayo abhijjhākāyaganthādīnaṃ paccayā honti,
atk-s0519a:788_1: tasmā “paṭhame yoge ṭhito abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:788_2: Tattha abhijjhāya kāyaṃ ganthatīti parābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇāya abhijjhāya nāmakāyaṃ ganthati ghaṭṭetīti attho.
atk-s0519a:788_3: Tathā bhavapatthanāya appahīnattā bhavadiṭṭhibhavarāgavasena āghātavatthūsu sattā cittāni padūsentīti āha –
atk-s0519a:788_5: Tathā diṭṭhivasena avijjāvasena ca sīlabbatehi sujjhati,
atk-s0519a:788_6: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ca abhinivisatīti āha –
atk-s0519a:789_1: Evaṃ ganthitāti evaṃ abhijjhāyanādivasena nāmakāyaṃ ganthitvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0519a:789_3: Kuto ca vuccati āsavantīti kuto pana hetuto te kilesā āsavantīti āsavahetuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0519a:789_4: Yasmā pana kilesā kusalappavattiṃ nivāretvā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantā,
atk-s0519a:789_5: maggena asamucchinnā eva vā āsavānaṃ uppattihetu honti,
atk-s0519a:789_7: Abhijjhākāyaganthena kāmāsavoti abhijjhākāyaganthena siddhena kāmarāgasabhāvattā kāmāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a:789_8: Katthacideva visaye domanassito tappaṭipakkhe visaye tabbisayabahule ca bhave patthetīti āha –
atk-s0519a:789_10: Parāmāsakāyaganthena diṭṭhāsavoti sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthena siddhena taṃsabhāvattā aparāparaṃ vā diṭṭhiyo ganthentassa diṭṭhāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a:789_11: Idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena avijjāsavoti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisantassa ayonisomanasikārato
atk-s0519a:789_12: anekehi akusalehi dhammehi saddhiṃ avijjāsavo uppajjati,
atk-s0519a:789_13: sabbesaṃ vā akusaladhammānaṃ avijjāpubbaṅgamattā idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena siddhena tassa hetubhūto avijjāsavo siddho hoti.
atk-s0519a:790_0: Yasmā pana āsavā eva paribuddhā vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osādentīti “oghā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0519a:791_4: Hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhantīti cittassa abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ hadayaṃ āhantvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0519a:791_6: Tena vuccanti sallāti yasmā ajjhāsayaṃ anupaviṭṭhā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0519a:791_9: “Eso me attā”ti gahaṇamukhena “esohamasmī”ti gahaṇaṃ hotīti diṭṭhiṃ nissāyapi mānaṃ jappentīti āha “diṭṭhoghena mānasallo”ti.
atk-s0519a:792_0: Pariyādinnanti aññassa okāsaṃ adatvā samantato gahitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:792_1: Catūsu dhammesu saṇṭhahatīti ārammaṇapaccayatāya ārammaṇabhūtesu catūsu dhammesu patiṭṭhahati.
atk-s0519a:792_2: Tāni sarūpato dasseti “rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresū”ti.
atk-s0519a:793_0: Tattha rāgasallenāti rāgasallena hetubhūtena nandūpasecanena viññāṇenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:793_7: tadā upanissayakoṭiyāva nandiyā upasittaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:793_9: Yadā ca upanissayapaccayabhūtena dosasallena vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti vuccati,
atk-s0519a:793_11: upanissayakoṭiyā vā nandiyā upasittaṃ viññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:793_12: Vedanā pana tissopi tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvato.
atk-s0519a:793_13: Tattha paṭhamanayo domanassārammaṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa vasena vutto.
atk-s0519a:794_3: Ettha ca anādimatisaṃsāre itthipurisā rūpābhirāmāti rāgasallavasena paṭhamā viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitā.
atk-s0519a:794_4: Sabbāyapi vedanāya dukkhapariyāyasabbhāvato dukkhāya ca doso anusetīti dosasallavasena dutiyā,
atk-s0519a:794_6: saṅkhāresu samūhaghanaṃ dubbinibbhoganti mohasallavasena catutthī viññāṇaṭṭhiti yojitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:795_1: Tañca kammanti yaṃ “cetanā cetasika”nti pubbe vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:795_2: Ime ca kilesāti ime ca dasavatthukā kilesā.
atk-s0519a:796_1: Idāni āhārādayo nayānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “imā catasso disā”tiādi āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:796_3: Puna kabaḷīkāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsuyeva yassa puggalassa upakkilesā,
atk-s0519a:796_5: Tattha dasannaṃ suttānanti ekadesesu samudāyavohārena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:796_6: Samudāyesu hi pavattā samaññā avayavesupi dissati,
atk-s0519a:796_9: Eko atthoti ekassa atthassa nipphādanato vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:796_10: Byañjanameva nānanti ettha byañjanaggahaṇena byañjanatthopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:796_12: Taṇhā ca rāgacaritaṃ puggalaṃ khippaṃ dūsetīti āha –
atk-s0519a:796_14: Yathā ca paṭhamadisābhāvena vuttadhammā rāgacaritassa upakkilesā,
atk-s0519a:796_16: Tatiyacatutthadisābhāvena vuttadhammā yathākkamaṃ diṭṭhicaritassa mandassa tikkhassa ca upakkilesā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:797_0: Āhāravipallāsādayo yadipi sabbehi tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pubbabhāge yathārahaṃ pariññeyyā pahātabbā ca.
atk-s0519a:797_1: Yassa pana dukkhānupassanā purime āhāradvaye dukkhākārena bahulaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0519a:797_2: tassa vasena yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0519a:797_4: ime appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:797_8: Na hi ariyamaggānaṃ viya pahātabbesu vimokkhamukhānaṃ pariññeyyapahātabbesu koci niyamo sambhavati.
atk-s0519a:797_12: iti evaṃ vuttappakārā sabbe āhārādayo lokasaṅkhātavaṭṭānusārino dhammā te lokabhūtā vaṭṭato niyyanti aniccānupassanādīhi tīhi vimokkhamukhehīti.
atk-s0519a:798_1: Evaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtadhamme niddisitvā idāni vodānapakkhe disābhūtadhamme dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:798_6: Indriyasaṃvaro tapasaṅkhāto puññadhammo bojjhaṅgabhāvanā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānañcāti cattāro sukhabhāgiyā dhammā veditabbāti.
atk-s0519a:799_1: Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti?
atk-s0519a:799_5: Kiñcāpi catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu “idaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānaṃ imāya eva paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti niyamo natthi,
atk-s0519a:799_6: tathāpi paṭhamāya paṭipadāya paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti sambhavavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0519a:799_9: Yasmā pana āhāravipallāsādīnaṃ viya paṭipadāsatipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthato nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a:799_10: Satipaṭṭhānāniyeva hi tathā tathā paṭipajjamānāni dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādināmakāni honti,
atk-s0519a:799_11: tasmā yathā saṃkilesapakkhe “paṭhame āhāre paṭhamo vipallāso”tiādinā adhikaraṇabhedena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:800_0: Andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya kadācideva uppajjanakaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0519a:800_4: Na hi mānappahānādito aññaṃ durabhisambhavataraṃ vimhanīyañca upalabbhatīti adhitiṭṭhati etena,
atk-s0519a:800_5: ettha vā adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:800_13: Ekassapi sattassa asubhabhāvanādayo viya ekadese avattitvā anavasesapariyādānato natthi etissā pamāṇanti appamaññā.
atk-s0519a:801_0: Paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūretīti paṭhamāya paṭipadāya bhāvanābahulīkāro
atk-s0519a:801_3: Yathā hi ariyamagge bhāvite satipaṭṭhānādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā sabbepi bhāvitā eva honti,
atk-s0519a:802_0: Kāyānupassanāya kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato “paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato kāmapaṭipakkhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripūretī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:802_2: sappītikassa dutiyajjhānassa cittassa abhippamodanavasena pavattamānaṃ tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṃsagatasukhassa
atk-s0519a:802_3: tatiyajjhānassa aniccavirāgādivasena pavattiyā saṅkhāresu upekkhakaṃ catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvato
atk-s0519a:803_2: tatiyajjhānaṃ pītivirāgena sukhena vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ariyavihārānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:803_3: catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiāneñjappattaṃ āneñjavihārānaṃ visesato paccayo hoti,
atk-s0519a:803_4: tasmā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:804_1: Idāni paṭipadādayo vodānapakkhe disābhāvena vavatthapetuṃ “tattha imā catasso disā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:804_3: Puna “paṭhamā paṭipadā”tiādi paṭipadācatukkādīsu yena yassa puggalassa vodānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:804_6: Yadipi tīsu vimokkhamukhesu “idaṃ nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ imāya eva paṭipadāya ijjhatī”ti niyamo natthi.
atk-s0519a:804_7: Yesaṃ pana puggalānaṃ purimāhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena ariyamaggādhigamo.
atk-s0519a:804_9: yassa ca catutthāya paṭipadāya animittavimokkhamukhena ariyamaggādhigamo,
atk-s0519a:805_0: Tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti tesaṃ asantāsanajavaparakkamādivisesayogena sīhānaṃ buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānañca vikkīḷitaṃ viharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:805_3: taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:805_4: Tattha tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvo pahātabbabhāvo pahāyakabhāvo ca āhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitīnañcettha pahātabbabhāvo tappaṭibandhachandarāgavasena daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a:805_5: Tattha “vikkīḷitaṃ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā cā”tiādi tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0519a:805_6: tesaṃ vikkīḷitanti ettha yadetaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhāvetabbānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā,
atk-s0519a:805_8: Tathā pahātabbassa dasavatthukassa kilesapuñjassa tadaṅgādivasena pahānaṃ byantīkiriyā anavasesananti.
atk-s0519a:805_9: Idāni taṃ saṅkhepena dassento “indriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ vipariyāsānadhiṭṭhāna”nti āha.
atk-s0519a:806_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti indriyānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā ca.
atk-s0519a:806_2: Indriyāni saddhammagocaroti indriyāni cettha saddhammassa gocarabhūtāni pavattihetūti adhippetāni saddhindriyādīnīti attho.
atk-s0519a:806_3: Vipariyāsā kilesagocaroti vipallāsā saṃkilesapakkhassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetūti.
atk-s0519a:806_4: Ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmīti yāyaṃ “cattāro āhārā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:806_5: “catasso paṭipadā”tiādinā vodānapakkhepi dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ upakkilesavodānavibhāvanāmukhena niddhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a:807_1: Idāni ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayavasena tipukkhalanayassa bhūmiṃ vibhāvetukāmo yasmā pana nayānaṃ aññamaññānuppavesassa
atk-s0519a:807_3: tasmā paṭipadāvibhāgato cattāro puggale sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmiṃ niddisitvā tato eva ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattaye
atk-s0519a:807_5: Tattha ime dve puggalāti ime purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena dve puggalā.
atk-s0519a:807_7: Puna “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi yathāvuttapuggalacatukkato ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ niddhāretuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:807_12: Ekassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ dve paṭipadā sambhavantīti.
atk-s0519a:807_13: Yathāvuttāsu pana dvīsu paṭipadāsu yo yāya kāyaci niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:807_15: Yasmā pana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭipadā calati na calatīti vicāraṇāyaṃ “calatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:807_16: tasmā ekassapi puggalassa jhānantaramaggantaresu paṭipadābhedo icchitovāti.
atk-s0519a:808_4: Tena adhicittasikkhañca adhipaññāsikkhañca vipañcitaññussa paññapetīti attho.
atk-s0519a:809_0: Cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:809_1: cattāro puggalā hutvā tayo puggalā hontīti attho.
atk-s0519a:810_0: Ayaṃ saṃkilesoti ayaṃ akusalamūlādidvādasattikasaṅgaho saṃkilissati etenāti saṃkilesoti katvā.
atk-s0519a:811_0: Tīṇi hutvā dve bhavantīti nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa disābhūtadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:812_0: Kasmā panettha nayānaṃ uddesānukkamena niddeso na katoti?
atk-s0519a:812_3: tatiyanayato ca dutiyanayassa sambhavoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ paṭhamanayānantaraṃ tatiyanayo,
atk-s0519a:812_6: dutiyanayato paṭhamanayopi sambhavatīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ante “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā paṭhamanayassa bhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0519a:812_11: tīṇi hutvā cattāri bhavantī”ti ayampi nayo vattabbo siyāti?
atk-s0519a:812_13: ayaṃ pana nayo atthato dassito evāti katvā na vutto.
atk-s0519a:812_14: Yasmā tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anuppaveso icchito,
atk-s0519a:812_15: sati ca anuppavese tato viniggamopi sambhavati evāti.
atk-s0519a:813_1: cattāro puggalā taṇhācarito duvidho mudindriyo tikkhindriyo ca.
atk-s0519a:813_3: Tattha taṇhācarito mudindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:813_5: diṭṭhicarito pana mudindriyo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:813_7: Iti imāsu paṭipadāsu yathārahaṃ ṭhitehi taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritehi cattāro āhārā tappaṭibandhachandarāgappahānena pahātabbā.
atk-s0519a:813_8: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā cattāro vipallāsā daṭṭhabbāti sabbo yathāvuttanayo anugantabbo.
atk-s0519a:814_3: na ca ye kāmesu anusayā samūhatā,
atk-s0519a:814_5: Tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī “kāmehi natthi attho”ti,
atk-s0519a:814_12: tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā bhikkhu “kāmehi natthi attho”ti,
atk-s0519a:814_15: Iti ime sabbe sattā dvīsu paṭipadāsu samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti dukkhāyañca sukhāyañca.
atk-s0519a:815_1: te dvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca.
atk-s0519a:815_7: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti,
atk-s0519a:815_12: Tattha taṇhācaritā sattā duvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca.
atk-s0519a:815_18: Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti,
atk-s0519a:815_24: Ye hi keci nibbutā nibbāyanti nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi,
atk-s0519a:816_1: cattāro vipallāsā upādānā yogā ganthā āsavā oghā sallā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo agatigamanānīti evaṃ imāni sabbāni dasa padāni.
atk-s0519a:819_0: Tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati,
atk-s0519a:819_2: Dutiye vipallāse ṭhito anāgataṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati,
atk-s0519a:819_6: Catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attato upādiyati,
atk-s0519a:820_0: Tattha kāmupādāne ṭhito kāme abhijjhāya ganthati,
atk-s0519a:822_0: Te cattāro āsavā vepullaṃ gatā oghā honti,
atk-s0519a:823_0: Te cattāro oghā āsayamanupaviṭṭhā anusayasahagatā vuccanti sallāti hadayamāhacca tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0519a:824_0: Imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṃ viññāṇaṃ catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu.
atk-s0519a:824_2: Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanaṃ rūpūpagaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0519a:825_0: Catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi catubbidhaṃ agatiṃ gacchanti chandā dosā bhayā mohā.
atk-s0519a:825_5: iti imāni ca kammāni ime ca kilesā ayaṃ saṃsārahetu.
atk-s0519a:826_0: Tatthimā catasso disā kabaḷīkāro āhāro “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo abhijjhākāyagantho
atk-s0519a:826_1: kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti chandā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:827_0: Phasso āhāro “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso sīlabbatupādānaṃ bhavayogo byāpādakāyagantho bhavāsavo bhavogho
atk-s0519a:828_0: Manosañcetanāhāro “anattani attā”ti vipallāso diṭṭhupādānaṃ diṭṭhiyogo parāmāsakāyagantho diṭṭhāsavo
atk-s0519a:828_1: diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṃ saññūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti bhayā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:829_0: Viññāṇāhāro “anicce nicca”nti vipallāso attavādupādānaṃ avijjāyogo idaṃsaccābhinivesokāyagantho avijjāsavo
atk-s0519a:829_1: avijjogho mohasallaṃ saṅkhārūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti mohā agatigamanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:829_3: Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ suttānaṃ paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:829_8: Iminā nayena sabbe kilesā catūsu padesu pakkhipitabbā.
atk-s0519a:830_3: cattāro vihārā dibbo brahmā ariyo āneñjo,
atk-s0519a:830_7: cattāro samādhayo chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhi,
atk-s0519a:830_8: cattāro dhammā sukhabhāgiyā nāññatra bojjhaṅgā nāññatra tapasā nāññatra indriyasaṃvarā nāññatra sabbanissaggā,
atk-s0519a:831_0: Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_1: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_2: paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_3: paṭhamo vihāro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_4: paṭhamaṃ sammappadhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ dhammaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_5: paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:831_9: Evaṃ yāva sabbanissaggā catutthaṃ appamāṇaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0519a:832_0: Tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamañca jhānaṃ paṭhamañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:832_1: paṭhamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca chandasamādhi ca indriyasaṃvaro ca mettā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:833_0: Dutiyā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ brahmā ca vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:833_1: dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānañca cittasamādhi ca tapo ca karuṇā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:834_0: Tatiyā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānaṃ tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ ariyo ca vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:834_1: tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca vīriyasamādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0519a:835_0: Catutthī ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthañca jhānaṃ catutthañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjo ca vihāro catutthañca
atk-s0519a:835_1: sammappadhānaṃ catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānañca vīmaṃsāsamādhi ca sabbanissaggo
atk-s0519a:836_19: cattāri ca agatigamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni.
atk-s0519a:838_1: Paṭipadāvibhāgena catūsu puggalesu yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
atk-s0519a:839_2: neyyassa adhisīlasikkhā ca adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā ca.
atk-s0519a:839_3: Iti imesaṃ puggalānaṃ catūhi paṭipadāhi niyyānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:842_0: Tattha lobho akusalamūlaṃ manāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0519a:842_1: Tadeva manāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a:842_2: sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a:842_7: rāgajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:843_1: Tadeva amanāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a:843_2: dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a:843_7: dosajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:843_8: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhadukkhatā.
atk-s0519a:844_1: Tadeva upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso,
atk-s0519a:844_2: adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā,
atk-s0519a:844_7: mohajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0519a:844_9: Iti ayaṃ tīhi ākārehi kilesānaṃ niddeso.
atk-s0519a:846_1: Sutamayi paññā paripuṇṇā savitakkasavicāraṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0519a:849_0: Iti ime tayo dhammā akusalapakkhikā kusalapakkhikā ca tikaniddesehi niddiṭṭhā tipukkhalanayassa disā nāma.
atk-s0519a:849_1: Tassa pariyosānaṃ tayo vimokkhā appaṇihito suññato animitto,
atk-s0519a:850_0: Tattha ye ime tayo puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ dve puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya,
atk-s0519a:850_5: Te visesena dve honti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito ca.
atk-s0519a:850_9: avijjā ca taṇhā ca ahirīkañca anottappañca asati ca asampajaññañca nīvaraṇāni ca saṃyojanāni ca ajjhosānañca
atk-s0519a:850_10: abhiniveso ca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca dovacassatā ca kosajjañca ayonisomanasikāro ca vicikicchā
atk-s0519a:850_11: ca avijjā ca asaddhammassavanañca asamāpatti ca.
atk-s0519a:851_0: Tattha avijjā ca ahirīkañca asati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asaddhammassavanañca,
atk-s0519a:852_0: Taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṃyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṃkāro ca dovacassatā ca ayonisomanasikāro ca avijjā ca asamāpatti ca,
atk-s0519a:852_2: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni paṭhamā disāti kātabbāni.
atk-s0519a:852_3: Saṃkhittena atthaṃ ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇhapakkhassa dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni dutiyakāni,
atk-s0519a:853_1: Samatho ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañca sati ca sampajaññañca hirī ca ottappañca ahaṃkārappahānañca
atk-s0519a:853_2: mamaṃkārappahānañca sammāvāyāmo ca yonisomanasikāro ca sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca paññā ca nibbidā
atk-s0519a:853_3: ca samāpatti ca saddhammassavanañca somanassañca dhammānudhammapaṭipatti ca.
atk-s0519a:854_0: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ samathādīni somanassapariyosānāni paṭhamāni dasa padāni paṭhamā disā,
atk-s0519a:854_1: vipassanādīni dhammānudhammapaṭipattipariyosānāni dutiyāni dasa padāni dutiyā disā.
atk-s0519a:854_2: Iti akusalapakkhe kusalapakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa catasso disā.
atk-s0519a:855_0: Tāsu kusalapakkhe samathādīhi akusalapakkhe taṇhādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:855_2: kusalapakkhe vipassanādīhi akusalapakkhe avijjādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:855_4: Iti imā dve vimuttiyo nandiyāvaṭṭanaye pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:856_0: Tattha taṇhā avijjā samatho vipassanāti cattāri padāni,
atk-s0519a:856_2: Samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni pañca padāni samathaṃ bhajanti,
atk-s0519a:856_3: vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni vipassanaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0519a:856_4: Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:856_5: Taṇhā ca lobho ca doso ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni pañca padāni taṇhaṃ bhajanti,
atk-s0519a:856_6: avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni avijjaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0519a:856_7: Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:856_8: Iti tipukkhalo ca sīhavikkīḷito ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a:857_0: Kathaṃ tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti?
atk-s0519a:857_1: Vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni amoho,
atk-s0519a:857_2: samatho ca alobho ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni alobho,
atk-s0519a:857_4: Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:857_5: Taṇhā ca lobho ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni lobho,
atk-s0519a:857_6: avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni moho,
atk-s0519a:857_8: Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:857_9: Iti tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a:858_0: Kathaṃ catūsu padesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosaranti?
atk-s0519a:858_9: Iti nava padāni akusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:858_10: Samatho ca asubhasaññā ca paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:858_11: alobho ca dukkhasaññā ca dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:858_12: vipassanā ca aniccasaññā ca tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:858_13: amoho ca anattasaññā ca catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:858_14: Iti nava padāni kusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti.
atk-s0519a:858_15: Evaṃ sīhavikkīḷitanaye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
atk-s0519a:858_18: Tasmā ekekassa nayassa akusale vā dhamme viññāte kusale vā paṭipakkho anvesitabbo.
atk-s0519a:858_20: Tamhi naye niddiṭṭhe yathā ekamhi naye itaresaṃ nayānaṃ mūlapadāni anuppaviṭṭhāni,
atk-s0519a:859_0: Tattha ekekasmiṃ dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammā viññātā honti.
atk-s0519a:859_1: Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa cattāri phalāni pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0519a:860_0: Tipukkhalassa nayassa tayo vimokkhā pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya appaṇihito,
atk-s0519a:861_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa dve vimuttiyo pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya taṇhāvirāgā cetovimutti,
atk-s0519a:861_2: Imesu tīsu nayesu yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ padānaṃ ālocanā,
atk-s0519a:861_4: Yā āloketvā kusalapakkhe akusalapakkhe ca “ayaṃ dhammo imaṃ dhammaṃ bhajatī”ti jānantena sammā yojanā,
atk-s0519a:861_5: ayaṃ aṅkuso nayoti ime pañca nayā.
atk-s0519a:864_1: Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva
atk-s0519a:864_4: evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti dassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
atk-s0519a:864_10: tassā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ pakārehi ṭhānaṃ pavatti sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0519a:864_16: Tesaṃ pana samūhabhāvato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso paṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a:865_3: “Ye te goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti āgataṭṭhānasmiñhi yena paṭṭhānena te “goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a:865_5: Iti nātivitthāritanayesu hāranayesu anissaṅgagamanassa desanāñāṇassa saṃkilesabhāgiyādilokiyādibhedesu
atk-s0519a:865_6: tadubhayavomissakabhedesu ca vitthāritanayalābhato nissaṅgavasena pavattagamanattā te saṃkilesabhāgiyādayo
atk-s0519a:865_7: lokiyādayo ca visuṃ visuṃ vomissā ca adhikaraṇavasena paṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a:865_8: Tesaṃ pakāsanato ayaṃ pakaraṇappadeso paṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:867_0: Tāni pana cha dukā cattāro tikā ekaṃ catukkaṃ aparampi ekaṃ catukkanti dvādasa honti.
atk-s0519a:867_1: Tesu cattāro dukā dve ca tikā uddhaṭā,
atk-s0519a:867_4: Iminā nayena tepi gahetuṃ sakkāti pāḷiyaṃ saṃkhittāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:867_8: Tattha yasmā katthaci sutte taṇhāsaṃkilesova niddisīyati,
atk-s0519a:867_11: tasmā saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ tidhā vibhajitvā uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a:867_12: Tathā vodānaṃ nāma saṃkilese sati hotīti vodānabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesavibhāgena tidhāva uddiṭṭhaṃ “taṇhāvodānabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādinā.
atk-s0519a:867_13: Taṃ pana atthato vāsanābhāgiyādi eva hoti.
atk-s0519a:868_0: “Tattha saṃkileso tividho”tiādi saṃkilesapaṭipakkhato samathādiniddhāraṇavasena vāsanābhāgiyādisuttānaṃ visayadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:868_1: Tattha yadi āsatti uppajjati bhavesūti bhavesu chandarāgaṃ pajahituṃ asakkontassa yadi bhavapatthanā uppajjati.
atk-s0519a:868_2: Evaṃ sāyanti evamassa puggalassa ayaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu bhavati pujjabhavaphalanibbattanato.
atk-s0519a:868_3: Tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatīti tatra tatra bhave upapattiyā saṃvattati.
atk-s0519a:868_4: Imāni cattāri suttānīti imāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni cattāri suttāni.
atk-s0519a:868_8: vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ padantarasaṃyojanavasena missitāni katāni.
atk-s0519a:868_9: Aṭṭha bhavantīti purimāni cattāri imāni cattārīti evaṃ aṭṭha bhavanti.
atk-s0519a:869_0: Tāniyeva aṭṭha suttāni sādhāraṇāni katāni soḷasa bhavantīti tāniyeva yathāvuttāni aṭṭha suttāni vāsanābhāgiyañca
atk-s0519a:869_8: navāsanābhāgiyañca nanibbedhabhāgiyañca na asekkhabhāgiyañcāti evaṃ sādhāraṇāni katāni purimāni aṭṭha imāni aṭṭhāti soḷasa bhavanti.
atk-s0519a:869_12: aparopi eko catukkoti ayampi vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:869_14: dve catukkā ca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:870_0: Idāni imassa paṭṭhānassa sakalasāsanasaṅgahitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “imehi soḷasahi suttehi bhinnehi navavidhaṃ suttaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:870_2: imehi saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi soḷasahi suttehi paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ pariyattisāsanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0519a:870_4: Iminā soḷasavidhena paṭṭhānena asaṅgahito pariyattisāsanassa padeso natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:870_7: Tattha gāthāya gāthā anuminitabbāti ayaṃ gāthā viya gāthā saṃkilesabhāgiyāti vā vāsanābhāgiyāti vā nibbedhabhāgiyāti
atk-s0519a:870_9: anu anu minitvā takketvā jānitabbāti attho.
atk-s0519a:870_11: Ettha ca gāthāveyyākaraṇavinimuttā sabbā pariyatti “suttenā”tipadena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a:871_1: Idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīni suttāni yathāniddiṭṭhāni udāharaṇavasena vibhāvetuṃ “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:871_2: Tattha “kāmandhā jālasañchannā”ti gāthāya attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0519a:871_4: evaṃ ito parānampi heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ uttānapadānañca atthaṃ na vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a:873_0: “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti gāthāyaṃ manoti yadipi kāmāvacarakusalādibhedaṃ sabbampi catubhūmakacittaṃ mano,
atk-s0519a:873_1: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cakkhupālattherassa purimajātiyaṃ vejjabhūtassa uppannavasena niyamiyamānaṃ paṭighasampayuttacittameva labbhati.
atk-s0519a:873_5: te pana vedanādayo tayo arūpino khandhā.
atk-s0519a:873_7: Kathaṃ panetehi saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekasmiñca ārammaṇe ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno mano pubbaṅgamo nāma hotīti?
atk-s0519a:873_9: Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādikammāni karontesu “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-s0519a:873_10: yaṃ yaṃ nissāya te taṃ kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0519a:873_11: so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati,
atk-s0519a:873_13: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0519a:873_14: Na hi te mane anuppajjante uppajjituṃ sakkuṇanti,
atk-s0519a:873_15: mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjati eva.
atk-s0519a:874_1: Yathā hi corādīnaṃ corajeṭṭhakādayo adhipatino seṭṭhā,
atk-s0519a:874_3: Yathā pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni bhaṇḍāni dārumayādīni nāma honti,
atk-s0519a:874_4: tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma.
atk-s0519a:874_5: Paduṭṭhenāti abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena dūsitena bhāsati vā karoti vā.
atk-s0519a:874_6: So hi bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritameva bhāsati,
atk-s0519a:874_8: abhāsanto akaronto tehi abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamanatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0519a:874_10: Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti duccaritānubhāvena catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anugacchati.
atk-s0519a:874_13: yathā nāma sakaṭaṃ vahato balībaddassa padaṃ paharantaṃ cakkaṃ anugacchati,
atk-s0519a:875_5: Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehato bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0519a:875_8: yadā puriso middhī ca hoti mahagghaso ca,
atk-s0519a:875_9: nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto niddāsīlo saṃparivattasāyī,
atk-s0519a:875_10: tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasi kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a:875_11: Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0519a:876_3: Atidhonacārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye idamatthitāya alametenāti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā,
atk-s0519a:876_6: yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya yato taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:876_8: evamevaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni attano santāne
atk-s0519a:876_9: uṭṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
atk-s0519a:877_0: “Coro yathā”ti gāthāyaṃ coro yathā sandhimukhe gahītoti yathā coro gharasandhiṃ chinditvā gehaṃ pavisanto gharasandhimukhe eva rājapurisehi gahito.
atk-s0519a:877_1: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti tena attanā katakammena kasābhitāḷanādinā haññati ceva addubandhanādinā bajjhati ca.
atk-s0519a:877_2: Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā paratthāti evampi ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā ito cavitvā paraloke.
atk-s0519a:877_3: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti attanāva katena pāpakammena nirayādīsu nānappakārehi kammakāraṇādīhi haññati ceva paribajjhati cāti.
atk-s0519a:878_0: “Sukhakāmānī”ti gāthāyaṃ yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi vā vibādhati.
atk-s0519a:878_1: Pecca so na labhe sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ vā na labhati,
atk-s0519a:879_0: Gunnaṃ ce taramānānanti gāvīsu mahoghaṃ tarantīsu.
atk-s0519a:879_1: Jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavoti yadi yūthapati usabho kuṭilaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a:879_2: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbāpi tā gāviyo kuṭilameva gacchanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a:879_3: Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nettari kuṭilaṃ gate sati,
atk-s0519a:879_5: So hi tāsaṃ paccayiko upaddavaharo ca.
atk-s0519a:881_0: Kukkuccajanakeneva pattavaṭṭippabhavassa upacchinnattā phaluppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a:881_2: Tathā phalapariyosānattā osadhīnaṃ “phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:881_3: Vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā assatarī nāma,
atk-s0519a:881_4: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a:881_6: athassa cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti,
atk-s0519a:881_13: evaṃ attano kammaphalabhūto sakkāro asappurisaṃ vināsetīti.
atk-s0519a:882_1: paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ katvā uddhaṃ katvā ukkhipitvā caranto.
atk-s0519a:885_6: Taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissatīti taṃ dhanaṃ kena nu pakārena tesaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0519a:885_7: Adhammena tesaṃ sambhatattā tesu naciraṭṭhitikaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:885_8: Antarāyā su bhavissantīti adhammiyavohārādito rājantarāyādayo bhavissanti.
atk-s0519a:885_10: Sambhatassa vinassatīti imassa sambhataṃ sajjitaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0519a:885_12: Sā hi rūpādīhi sobhanehi aggoti saggoti adhippetā.
atk-s0519a:886_1: Lobhā khaṇati attānanti lobhahetu apuññāni karonto kāyavisamādiyogena attānaṃ khaṇati nāma.
atk-s0519a:887_0: Carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0519a:887_1: Bālāti idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma.
atk-s0519a:887_3: Na hi paññāya duṭṭhattaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0519a:887_4: Amittenevāti amittabhūtena viya verinā viya hutvā.
atk-s0519a:887_8: yaṃ katvā anutappatīti yaṃ kammaṃ nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudayaṃ katvā anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati anusocati,
atk-s0519a:887_9: taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ na bhaddakaṃ.
atk-s0519a:887_10: Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ paṭisevati anubhoti.
atk-s0519a:888_0: Dukkaranti vattapaṭivattapūraṇādivasena ābhisamācārikasīlassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:888_1: Samādānato paṭṭhāya khaṇḍaṃ akatvā visesato ādibrahmacariyakassa carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya duttitikkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:888_2: sīlasaṃvarādayo vā aparikkhate katvā sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:888_9: Atha vā dukkarantipadassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ duttitikkhanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:888_14: yaṃ paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi…pe…
atk-s0519a:888_15: saṭṭhipi vassāni dantebhi dantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṃ āhacca cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvā ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ
atk-s0519a:888_16: paṭisevamānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti,
atk-s0519a:888_17: taṃ bālā abyattā kātuṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0519a:888_18: Bahūhi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte ariyamagge bahū sambādhā,
atk-s0519a:889_0: Appameyyaṃ paminantoti appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ “ettakasīlo ayaṃ ettakasamādhi ettakapañño”ti evaṃ minanto.
atk-s0519a:889_1: Kodha vidvā vikappayeti ko idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya,
atk-s0519a:889_3: Nivutaṃ maññeti yo pana puthujjano minetuṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0519a:890_2: Visaṃ halāhalaṃ ivāti halāhalasaṅkhātaṃ visaṃ iva.
atk-s0519a:890_3: Evaṃ viraddhaṃ pātetīti viraddhaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitapuggalaṃ evaṃ apāyesu vinipāteti.
atk-s0519a:890_4: Vācā dubbhāsitā yathāti yathā vācā ariyūpavādanavasena dubbhāsitā.
atk-s0519a:891_2: Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo guṇavisiṭṭhatāya pasaṃsāraho puggalo,
atk-s0519a:891_3: taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati.
atk-s0519a:891_8: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbena attano dhanenāpi attanāpi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0519a:891_14: tassa ayaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a:891_19: Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya pañca ca abbudāni.
atk-s0519a:891_21: yaṃ kālaṃ ariyagarahivācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
atk-s0519a:892_8: Pesuṇiyaṃ anuyuttoti pesuṇiyasmiṃ anuyutto aggasāvakānaṃ bhedanena.
atk-s0519a:892_9: Kokālikañhi mīyamānaṃ ovadantena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena bhāsitā imā gāthāti.
atk-s0519a:892_17: Mā bahubhāṇidha nerayikosīti idāni bahubhāṇī mā hohi,
atk-s0519a:893_0: Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyanti idaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ sabhāvabhedato avatthābhedato ca anekabhedakaṃ dassetuṃ anekehi
atk-s0519a:893_1: suttapadehi udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:895_2: Phītanti telamadhuphāṇitādīhi ca dhanadhaññādīhi ca vipulaṃ.
atk-s0519a:896_0: Pecca so labhateti yo bhūte daṇḍena na hiṃsati,
atk-s0519a:896_1: so puggalo paraloke manussabhūto manussasukhaṃ devabhūto dibbasukhaṃ ubhayaṃ atikkanto nibbānasukhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:897_3: Sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ caranti –
atk-s0519a:897_6: bhāvakānaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nibaddhavāsapariharaṇaṃ attano ca tattha anāsaṅgadassanaṃ,
atk-s0519a:897_9: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ carantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:898_4: Magge purisaṃ ṭhapesunti tesaṃ kira gāmadvārena bhagavato gamanamaggo,
atk-s0519a:898_5: tasmā “sace bhagavā amhākaṃ suttānaṃ vā pamattānaṃ vā gaccheyya,
atk-s0519a:898_6: atha passituṃ na labheyyāmā”ti maggamajjhe purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0519a:898_9: Bhagavā hi sakaṭamaggassa majjhe jaṅghamaggena agamāsi,
atk-s0519a:898_11: Maggā okkammāti buddhā hi kenaci saddhiṃ gacchantāva paṭisanthāraṃ karonti kenaci saddhiṃ ṭhitā kenaci saddhiṃ divasabhāgampi nisinnā,
atk-s0519a:898_14: imehi saddhiṃ nisīditvā divasabhāgaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0519a:898_16: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti te kira chattupāhanakattaradaṇḍapādabbhañjanatelāni ceva aṭṭhavidhañca pānakaṃ sarabhapādapallaṅkañca gāhāpetvā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0519a:898_19: Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti “chattupāhanādīni bhikkhusaṅghassa dethā”ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0519a:899_0: Sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatītiādi sabbaṃ majjhimadesavaseneva vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a:899_8: Āsanne no bhagavā bhavissatīti ettha na kevalaṃ āsannattā eva tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a:899_9: atha kho “idāni dānaṃ dātuṃ gandhamālādipūjaṃ kātuṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ labhissāmā”ti nesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:900_0: Tasmātiha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāsoti thapatayo yasmā tumhākaṃ mayi dūrībhūte anappakaṃ domanassaṃ āsanne anappakaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a:900_2: Gharāvāsassa hi dosena tumhākaṃ evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:900_3: Sace pana gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitā assatha,
atk-s0519a:900_4: evaṃ vo mayā saddhiṃyeva gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca taṃ na bhaveyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0519a:900_6: Mahāghare vasantassāpi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova.
atk-s0519a:900_9: Abbhokāso pabbajjāti pabbajjā pana akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena abbhokāso.
atk-s0519a:900_10: Caturatanikepi hi gabbhe dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭetvā nisinnānampi akiñcanāpalibodhaṭṭhena pabbajjā abbhokāso nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:900_11: Alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāyāti evaṃ sambādhagharāvāse vasantānaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādameva kātuṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0519a:901_2: Ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpemāti te kira dvepi janā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā dvīsu nāgesu tā itthiyo
atk-s0519a:901_3: evaṃ nisīdāpetvā rañño nāgaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:901_5: Nāgopi rakkhitabboti yathā kiñci visesitaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0519a:901_9: Attāpīti sitakathitavikkhepitādīni akarontehi attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a:901_10: Evaṃ karonto hi “sāmidubbhako eso”ti niggahetabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a:902_0: Tasmātiha thapatayoti yasmā tumhe rājā niccaṃ rājabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchāpeti,
atk-s0519a:902_2: Yasmā pana paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ paṭicchāpento natthi,
atk-s0519a:903_6: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti etena appamattakampi kiñci labhitvā tatopi saṃvibhāge rato.
atk-s0519a:903_10: Imehi kho thapatayo catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hotīti sotāpanno imehi dhammehi samannāgato hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:903_11: Etena sotāpannena imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekantato labbhamānataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0519a:904_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ thapatīnaṃ imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ pariyāyena dassetvā idāni nippariyāyena taṃ dassetuṃ “tumhe kho thapatayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:905_1: Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvā ahesunti attho.
atk-s0519a:905_9: Ajja tiṃsaṃ tato kappāti tato kappato ajja sampati ayaṃ kappo tiṃsatimo.
atk-s0519a:905_10: Tassā saññāya vāsanāti tassa buddhagatāya saññāya vāsanato.
atk-s0519a:906_9: Yassa sabbadhammesu ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhattā sadā ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0519a:906_10: So sabbaññū bhagavā theraṃ ānandaṃ etadabravīti sambandho.
atk-s0519a:906_11: Rājā raṭṭhe bhavissatīti sabbasmiṃ raṭṭhe rājā bhavissati.
atk-s0519a:907_1: Suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ nāvanti ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍitavasena chāditaṃ suvaṇṇanāvaṃ.
atk-s0519a:907_3: sakkassa iti me sutanti yathā sā devatā pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi,
atk-s0519a:907_4: evaṃ mayāpi sutanti āyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā yathāsutaṃ taṃ bhagavato vadati.
atk-s0519a:908_0: Paṃsuthūpesūti sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā paṃsūhi katathūpesu.
atk-s0519a:908_1: Evañhi te bhagavantaṃ uddissakatā nāma honti,
atk-s0519a:909_3: Uḷāraṃ vata taṃ āsīti taṃ mayā kataṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata ahosi.
atk-s0519a:909_6: mudito thūpaṃ apūjesīti thūpaṃ pūjetvā satasahassaṃ āyukappe ahaṃ muditoti attho.
atk-s0519a:910_3: Tasmiñca okappayi dhammamuttamanti tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamadhammaṃ paccekabodhiṃ “uttamadhammena nāma imasmiṃ bhavitabba”nti saddahiṃ.
atk-s0519a:910_4: “Tasmiñca dhamme paṇidhesiṃ mānasa”nti iminā paṭiladdhadhammaṃ ahampi sacchikareyyanti cittaṃ paṇidahiṃ.
atk-s0519a:910_5: Bhave kudāsupi ca mā apekkhavāti katthaci bhave apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti ca paṇidhesiṃ mānasanti sambandho.
atk-s0519a:911_10: Paccakkhaṃ khvimanti paccakkhaṃ kho imaṃ vacananti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:912_2: Patitassa ekanti tassa hatthato ekapupphaṃ patitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:913_2: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti ajjhattavisayā ca bahiddhavisayā ca.
atk-s0519a:913_3: Ye me vijjiṃsūti ye me pubbe vijjamānā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0519a:913_5: natthi dāni punabbhavoti punappunaṃ jāyanamīyanabhūto saṃsāro punabbhavoti ca vuccati,
atk-s0519a:914_0: Idaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ vāsanābhāgapuññavibhāvanānaṃ nānāsuttapadānaṃ udāharaṇavasena dassitaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:915_2: apunabbhavāyā”ti idaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttanti vuttaṃ oghataraṇassa ariyamaggakiccattā.
atk-s0519a:915_3: Na cetanā karaṇīyāti na cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:916_9: Jhāyatoti ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena ca jhānena jhāyantassa.
atk-s0519a:916_11: Athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbāti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa yā tā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0519a:916_13: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena “katamaṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0519a:916_16: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā ca nayena paccayākārakaṅkhā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:916_17: Yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādikā soḷasakaṅkhā “buddhe
atk-s0519a:916_18: kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī”tiādikā aṭṭha ca kaṅkhā āgatā,
atk-s0519a:916_19: tā sabbā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti, kasmā?
atk-s0519a:916_21: yasmā avijjādikena hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādiṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0519a:917_0: Yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedīhi yasmā paccayānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0519a:917_1: tasmā yadāssa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā dhammā pātubhavanti.
atk-s0519a:917_2: Athassa yā nibbānassa aviditattā kaṅkhā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0519a:918_1: Aññātuñchena yāpentanti kulesu aññāto niccanavoyeva hutvā uñchena piṇḍacariyāya yāpentaṃ.
atk-s0519a:918_2: Atha vā abhilakkhitesu issarajanagehesu kaṭukabhaṇḍasambhāraṃ sugandhabhojanaṃ pariyesantassa uñchanaṃ ñātuñchanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0519a:918_3: gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre ṭhitena laddhamissakabhojanaṃ aññātuñchanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0519a:919_1: Sukhaṃ setīti kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamānattā sukhaṃ sayati.
atk-s0519a:919_2: Na socatīti kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati.
atk-s0519a:919_4: Madhuraggassāti yaṃ akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā pahaṭassa paṭippaharitvā sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0519a:921_4: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti.
atk-s0519a:921_5: Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ dinnappahāro omaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a:921_6: adho ṭhatvā uddhaṃ mukhaṃ dinnappahāro ummaṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a:921_7: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā kato maṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0519a:921_10: So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohito ca hoti.
atk-s0519a:921_12: Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0519a:921_13: maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0519a:922_1: Yathā sattiyā omaṭṭhapuriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati.
atk-s0519a:922_2: Yathā ca dayhamāne matthake ādittasiro tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati,
atk-s0519a:922_3: evamevaṃ bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.
atk-s0519a:923_0: Evaṃ devatāya kathite atha bhagavā cintesi –
atk-s0519a:923_3: Punappunaṃ kathentīpi hi esā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānameva katheyya,
atk-s0519a:923_4: yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyyati,
atk-s0519a:923_5: tāva anubandhova hotī”ti tameva upamaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena devatāya vinivaṭṭetvā dassento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0519a:924_4: Virato kāmasaññāyāti yāya kāyaci sabbato kāmasaññāya catutthamaggasampayuttāya samucchedaviratiyā virato.
atk-s0519a:924_8: Catūhi maggehi dasannampi saṃyojanānaṃ atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātīto.
atk-s0519a:924_9: Catutthamaggeneva vā uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanātīto tatra tatrābhinandanato nandisaṅkhātāya taṇhāya tiṇṇañca bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandibhavaparikkhīṇo.
atk-s0519a:924_10: So tādiso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati.
atk-s0519a:925_1: aparabhāge ca sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā.
atk-s0519a:925_2: Taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati,
atk-s0519a:925_8: tasmā upasaṅkamanato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammassavanena sussūsaṃ labhate paññaṃ.
atk-s0519a:926_1: Taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvāpi vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā
atk-s0519a:926_3: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti evaṃ sussūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto
atk-s0519a:926_4: subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na itaro. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:927_0: Patirūpakārīti desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa dhammassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0519a:927_6: Dadanti paresaṃ yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ dento mittāni ganthati sampādeti karotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:927_11: sa ve pecca na socatīti yassa puggalassa ime saddhādayo dhammā vijjanti,
atk-s0519a:927_12: so imasmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gantvā na socati,
atk-s0519a:929_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
atk-s0519a:930_1: Āḷavakasutte hi imā gāthā āḷavakena “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”ntiādinā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitāti.
atk-s0519a:931_0: Yena kenaci vaṇṇenāti yena kenaci kāraṇena,
atk-s0519a:931_4: Manasā ce pasannenāti karuṇāsamussāhitena pasādena pasannena manasā.
atk-s0519a:931_5: Na tena hoti saṃyuttoti tena yathāvuttena anusāsanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanavasena saṃyutto nāma na hoti.
atk-s0519a:932_1: Rāgo ca doso cāti rāgadosā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
atk-s0519a:932_5: Aratī ratī lomahaṃso kutojāti yāyaṃ pantesu senāsanesu,
atk-s0519a:932_7: yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati abhirati āsatti kīḷanādi,
atk-s0519a:932_9: ime tayo dhammā kuto jātā kuto nibbattāti pucchā.
atk-s0519a:932_13: Kumārakā dhaṅkamivosajantīti yathā kumārakā kīḷantā kākaṃ suttena pāde bandhitvā osajanti khipanti,
atk-s0519a:932_14: evaṃ kusalamanaṃ akusalavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya osajantīti pucchā.
atk-s0519a:933_3: arati rati lomahaṃsā ca attabhāvato jātā.
atk-s0519a:933_4: Kāmavitakkādayo attabhāvato eva samuṭṭhāya kusalamanaṃ osajanti.
atk-s0519a:934_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ “itonidānā”tiādīsu attabhāvanidānā attabhāvato jātā attabhāvato samuṭṭhāyāti attho vutto,
atk-s0519a:934_3: Ete hi rāgādayo vitakkapariyosānā taṇhāsnehena jātā.
atk-s0519a:934_4: Tathā jāyantā ca pañcupādānakkhandhabhede attabhāvasaṅkhāte attani sambhūtā. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:934_9: yathā nigrodhassa khandhajasaṅkhātā pārohā āporasasaṅkhāte snehe sati jāyanti,
atk-s0519a:934_10: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva nigrodhe tesu tesu sākhappadesesu sambhavanti,
atk-s0519a:934_11: evaṃ ete rāgādayo ajjhattaṃ taṇhāsnehe sati jāyanti,
atk-s0519a:934_12: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkhādippadesesu iṭṭhārammaṇesu sambhavanti.
atk-s0519a:934_15: Puthu visattā kāmesūti yasmā rāgopi pañcakāmaguṇikādivasena,
atk-s0519a:934_16: dosopi āghātavatthuādivasena aratiādayopi tassa tassa bhedassa vasenāti sabbathā sabbepime kilesā puthu
atk-s0519a:934_17: anekappakārā hutvā vatthudvārārammaṇādivasena tesu tesu kāmesu tathā tathā visattā laggā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā. Kimiva?
atk-s0519a:934_18: Māluvāva vitatā vane yathā vane vitatā māluvā tesu tesu rukkhasākhappasākhādibhedesu visattā hoti laggā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0519a:934_20: tasmā ettha puthupabhedesu vatthukāmesu visattaṃ kilesagahanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:935_3: ye sattā naṃ kilesagahanaṃ “itonidānaṃ esa uppajjatī”ti jānanti,
atk-s0519a:935_4: te naṃ taṇhāsinehasinehite attabhāve uppajjatīti ñatvā taṃ taṇhāsinehaṃ ādīnavānupassanādibhāvanāñāṇagginā visosentā vinodenti pajahanti,
atk-s0519a:935_7: atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyāti ye hi saṃkilesagahanaṃ vinodenti,
atk-s0519a:935_9: Na hi maggabhāvanaṃ vinā kilesavinodanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0519a:935_10: Evaṃ maggaṃ bhāventā te pakatiñāṇena duttaraṃ kāmoghādiṃ catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā supinantenapi
atk-s0519a:936_0: Dukkaraṃ bhagavāti eko kira devaputto pubbayogāvacaro bahalakilesatāya sappayogena kilese vikkhambhento
atk-s0519a:936_1: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā pubbahetumandatāya ariyabhūmiṃ appatvāva kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0519a:936_2: so tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā dukkarabhāvaṃ ārocento evamāha.
atk-s0519a:936_4: saṭṭhipi vassāni ekantaparisuddhassa samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0519a:937_1: Te chetvā maccuno jālanti ye rattindivaṃ indriyūpasame ratā,
atk-s0519a:937_8: te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a:938_8: te ariyā maccuno jālasaṅkhātaṃ kilesajālaṃ chinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a:938_10: ayaṃ pana duggamo “bhagavā visamo maggo”ti āha.
atk-s0519a:938_11: Tattha kiñcāpi ariyamaggo neva duggamo na visamo,
atk-s0519a:938_15: Ariyamaggaṃ ārohituṃ asamatthatāya eva te magge papatantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a:938_16: Ariyānaṃ samo maggoti sveva maggo ariyānaṃ samo hoti.
atk-s0519a:938_17: Visame samāti visamepi sattakāye samā eva.
atk-s0519a:939_1: Idañhi taṃ jetavananti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgantvā evamāha.
atk-s0519a:939_3: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento “kammaṃ vijjā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:939_8: Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitañca uttamanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:939_12: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamanti.
atk-s0519a:939_13: “Etena maccā sujjhantī”ti etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0519a:940_2: Yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0519a:940_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati.
atk-s0519a:940_4: Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena ariyasaccadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0519a:940_5: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu ariyasaccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0519a:940_14: na therā uttaritaro nāma sāvako atthīti vadati.
atk-s0519a:941_10: Tattha tatthāti paccuppannampi dhammaṃ yattha yattheva so uppanno,
atk-s0519a:941_11: tattha tattheva naṃ aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi anupassanāhi vipassati,
atk-s0519a:941_14: Vipassanā hi rāgādīhi na saṃhirati na kuppatīti asaṃhīrā asaṃkuppā,
atk-s0519a:941_15: taṃ anubrūhaye vaḍḍheyya paṭivipasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:941_16: Atha vā nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi na saṃhirati na kuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ,
atk-s0519a:941_18: punappunaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento vaḍḍheyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:942_0: Tassa pana anubrūhanassa atthāya ajjeva kiccamātappanti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanena “ātappa”nti laddhanāmaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:942_1: Ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suveti sve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jānāti.
atk-s0519a:942_6: sve vā punadivase vā jānissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a:942_7: Mahāsenenāti ahivicchikavisasatthādīni hi anekāni maraṇakāraṇāni tassa senāti tāya mahatiyā senāya vasena
atk-s0519a:942_8: mahāsenena evarūpena maccunā saddhiṃ “katipāhaṃ tāva āgamehi,
atk-s0519a:942_9: yāvāhaṃ buddhapūjādiṃ attano avassayaṃ kammaṃ karomī”ti evaṃ mittasanthavākārasaṅkhāto vā “idaṃ sataṃ
atk-s0519a:942_10: vā sahassaṃ vā gahetvā katipāhaṃ āgamehī”ti evaṃ lañjānuppadānasaṅkhāto vā “iminā balarāsinā paṭibāhissāmī”ti
atk-s0519a:942_15: Evaṃ paṭipannattā bhaddo ekaratto assāti bhaddekaratto.
atk-s0519a:942_16: Itīti evaṃ paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ “bhaddekaratto aya”nti rāgādisantatāya santo buddhamuni ācikkhati.
atk-s0519a:943_0: Cakkhunā paññāya cāti cakkhunā ca paññāya ca.
atk-s0519a:943_2: Satiyā paññāya cāti satiyā ca paññāya ca,
atk-s0519a:945_1: Yassa selūpamaṃ cittanti ekaghanaṃ selaṃ viya pakativātehi lokadhammavātehi akampanīyato yassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:945_5: Kuto naṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ evaṃ bhāvitacittaṃ vītikkantalokadhammaṃ uttamapurisaṃ lokadhammahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ nānugamissati.
atk-s0519a:946_1: na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya huṃhuṅkārakasāvādipāpadhammayutto hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattena brāhmaṇoti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0519a:946_8: Dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyyāti so “brāhmaṇo aha”nti etaṃ vādaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0519a:946_9: Yassa sakalalokasannivāse kuhiñci ekārammaṇepi rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:947_3: tamo eva ca siyāti āsaṅkamāne sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0519a:947_4: Yadā ca attanāvedītiādīsu evaṃvidhaṃ nibbānaṃ attapaccakkhena ñāṇena yadā vindati,
atk-s0519a:947_5: atha rūpārūpadhammato sukhadukkhato ca vippamutto hotīti.
atk-s0519a:949_0: Nābhinandati āyantinti purāṇadutiyikaṃ āgacchantiṃ aññaṃ vā na abhinandati cittena na sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0519a:949_2: Saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ muttanti pañcavidhāpi saṅgato muttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0519a:950_0: Bahvetthāti bahu ettha nhāyati jano, na tena so suddho nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:951_1: Sahāyā vatāti samathavipassanābhāvanāya saha ayanavasena sahāyā vata.
atk-s0519a:951_2: Kālena kālaṃ sappāyadhammassa savanavasena cirarattaṃ sameti samāgamo etesanti cirarattasametikā.
atk-s0519a:952_3: ko visesoti satthu sāvakassa ca pañcasveva upādānakkhandhesu nibbidādayoti pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyaṃ anupādāvimuttiyañca
atk-s0519a:953_3: yadipi sāvakassa satthu ca vimuttiyaṃ viseso natthi,
atk-s0519a:953_4: sayambhuñāṇena pana savāsanasabbakilese khepetvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā anuppannassa ariyamaggassa
atk-s0519a:953_9: Antarā añño satthā uppādetā nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0519a:953_10: tasmā ayaṃ bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā nāma.
atk-s0519a:953_15: Magge ca amagge ca kovidoti maggakovido.
atk-s0519a:955_0: Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrāti ettha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā.
atk-s0519a:955_1: Yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ ayena nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ addubandhanasaṅkhātaṃ dārumayañca pabbajatiṇehi rajjuṃ katvā katarajjubandhanañca,
atk-s0519a:955_2: taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya “thira”nti na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a:956_0: Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ.
atk-s0519a:956_1: Sithilanti bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetvā bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā jalapathathalapathādīsu kammaṃ kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ.
atk-s0519a:956_2: Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummocayaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ.
atk-s0519a:956_3: Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0519a:957_2: Pakappetīti tameva akusalacetanaṃ kāyavacīkammabhāvaṃ pāpanavasena kappeti.
atk-s0519a:957_4: Ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyāti yadetaṃ cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ anusayanañca,
atk-s0519a:957_5: etaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ṭhitiyā pavattiyā paccayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0519a:957_6: Ārammaṇe sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti yathāvuttapaccaye sati abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa kammaṃ javāpetvā
atk-s0519a:957_8: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti āyatiṃ punabbhavasaṅkhātā viññāṇādīnaṃ abhinibbatti hoti.
atk-s0519a:958_6: te kusalassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā honti yevāti.
atk-s0519a:958_7: Sati ca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti hotīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0519a:959_2: ariyassa vinaye samuddo”tiādi yadi duppūraṇaṭṭhena saṃsīdanaṭṭhena duratikkamanaṭṭhena sāgaro “samuddo”ti vucceyya,
atk-s0519a:959_3: tato satabhāgenapi sahassabhāgenapi cakkhuādīsveva ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “cakkhu,
atk-s0519a:959_7: rūpesu sattānaṃ āviñchanato rūpāyatanameva vego cakkhussa vegoti attho.
atk-s0519a:960_0: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo bhikkhu saha visayena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato sammasanto
atk-s0519a:960_1: tattha ca nibbindanto virajjanto tappaṭibaddhato kilesajālato vimuccanto abhibhavati.
atk-s0519a:960_4: atari cakkhusamuddanti ayaṃ bhikkhu cakkhusaṅkhātaṃ samuddaṃ tiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:961_2: ariyassa vinaye samuddoti yadipi duppūraṇaṭṭhena yadi vā samudanaṭṭhena samuddo,
atk-s0519a:961_4: Tassa hi pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīlādiārammaṇaṃ samosarantaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a:961_6: Cakkhu ca tesu tesu nīlādiārammaṇesu samudeti asaṃvutaṃ hutvā osaramānaṃ kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvena
atk-s0519a:961_8: Tathā cakkhuṃ taṇhāsotādīnaṃ uppattidvāratāya tehi santānassa samudanaṭṭhena temanaṭṭhena samuddo.
atk-s0519a:961_9: Tassa rūpamayo vegoti samuddassa appamāṇo ūmimayo vego viya tassāpi cakkhusamuddassa samosarantassa nīlādibhedassa
atk-s0519a:961_10: ārammaṇassa vasena appameyyo rūpamayo vego veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:961_11: Yo taṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ sahatīti yo taṃ cakkhusamudde samosarantaṃ rūpamayaṃ vegaṃ manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ,
atk-s0519a:961_13: asamapekkhane mohanti evaṃ rāgādikilese anuppādento upekkhakabhāvena sahati.
atk-s0519a:963_0: Saūmibhayaṃ duttaraṃ accatarīti aniccatādiūmibhayena sabhayaṃ duratikkamaṃ atikkami.
atk-s0519a:964_0: Baḷisāti sattānaṃ anatthahetutāya baḷisā viya baḷisā.
atk-s0519a:964_3: Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā apariyiṭṭhā vā sukhārammaṇatāya iṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a:964_10: nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnampi hi rūpāyatanaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāvena cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena ca ekavidhataṃ
atk-s0519a:964_19: kilesamārassa baḷisabhūtaṃ rūpataṇhaṃ gilitvā ṭhitoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:965_1: Ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sattaloko jātasantāpo ñātibyasanādivasena uppannasokasantāpo ca rāgādivasena uppannapariḷāhasantāpo cāti attho.
atk-s0519a:965_3: Rodaṃ vadati attatoti taṃ taṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0519a:965_4: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā vilapanto vadati. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a:965_7: yasmā ete sattā yena yena pakārena attano dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti āsīsanti,
atk-s0519a:965_8: taṃ dukkhaṃ tato aññena pakārena tikicchitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:965_9: Yena vā pakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti,
atk-s0519a:965_10: tato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva pana hoti.
atk-s0519a:965_15: Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ abhinandati,
atk-s0519a:965_18: taṃ dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhatāya ca dukkhanti.
atk-s0519a:966_3: ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena pahānatthaṃ idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussatīti.
atk-s0519a:967_0: Evaṃ ariyassa maggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipanto “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:967_1: Tattha bhavenāti rūpabhavena vā arūpabhavena vā.
atk-s0519a:967_7: taṃnibbattena ca upapattibhavena bhavavisuddhiṃ vadantā bhavena bhavavippamokkhaṃ vadanti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:967_10: bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatanti hi pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi “bhavadiṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:967_11: Bhavadiṭṭhi eva uttarapadalopena “bhavo”ti vuttā bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya.
atk-s0519a:967_12: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkhaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0519a:967_19: Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjatīti hi pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a:969_9: taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:970_0: Lokamimaṃ passāti bhagavā attano cittaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0519a:970_5: puriso itthiyāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sattesu rataṃ,
atk-s0519a:970_7: Ye hi keci bhavāti ittarakhaṇā vā dīghāyukā vā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā bhavā.
atk-s0519a:970_10: Sabbe te bhavātiādīsu “sabbepi bhavā aniccā”tiādinā vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya aviparītaṃ passato bhavataṇhāpi pahīyati nirujjhati,
atk-s0519a:970_12: tassa sabba taṇhānaṃ anavasesato maggena nirujjhanato nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti.
atk-s0519a:970_13: Tassa evaṃ nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anupādānato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti.
atk-s0519a:970_14: Evaṃbhūtena ca abhibhūto pañcavidhopi māro vijito assa anena mārena saṅgāmo,
atk-s0519a:971_0: Anusotagāmī andhaputhujjano paṭisotagāmī kalyāṇaputhujjano. Ṭhitatto sekkho. Itaro asekkho.
atk-s0519a:972_3: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīladhammaṃ pasavati karoti,
atk-s0519a:972_5: Sukkaṃ dhammanti “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīce kule nibbatto,
atk-s0519a:972_6: idāni puññaṃ karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ sukkaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati,
atk-s0519a:972_8: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0519a:972_17: “Kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādikassa kammacatukkassa attho heṭṭhā hārasampātavāre vibhatto eva.
atk-s0519a:974_4: Kasmā panettha āmisapariccāgo arahattena samadhuro niddiṭṭhoti?
atk-s0519a:974_6: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti ucchedādivatthunā.
atk-s0519a:974_8: Dutiye yena yena vā pana vatthunāti amarāvikkhepavatthuādinā.
atk-s0519a:975_0: Iminā asubhena kammavipākenāti asubhassa kāyaduccaritādikammassa vipākattā asubhena asivena kammavipākena.
atk-s0519a:975_1: Idaṃ bālalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatīti purimasmiṃ bhave duccaritasamaṅgitāya bālo ayaṃ bhavatīti upalakkhaṇaṃ jāyati.
atk-s0519a:975_2: Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ evaṃ pavattaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:976_0: Iminā subhenāti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0519a:976_3: Sānusayassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ jāyatīti appahīnānusayassa paccayasamāyoge rāgādayo pariyuṭṭhānavasena pavattanti.
atk-s0519a:977_1: Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0519a:977_2: dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi saṅgahito,
atk-s0519a:977_3: na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi,
atk-s0519a:977_4: tasmā mūlapadaṃ vibhajitabbatañca dassetuṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a:977_9: Idha pana lokiyo attho yasmiṃ sutte vutto,
atk-s0519a:977_20: Buddhādīnaṃ pana guṇābhitthavanavasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ thavo nāma.
atk-s0519a:978_0: Tattha sajjukhīranti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ abbhuṇhakhīraṃ.
atk-s0519a:978_3: yathā dhenuyā thanato nikkhantaṃ khīraṃ taṅkhaṇaṃyeva na muccati na pariṇamati na dadhibhāvaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a:978_4: takkādiambilasamāyogato pana parato kālantarena pakatiṃ jahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:978_14: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno vītaccitaṅgāro akkantopi chārikāya paṭicchannattā na tāva ḍahati,
atk-s0519a:978_15: chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā cammādīni ḍahanavasena yāva matthaluṅgā ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0519a:978_17: taṃ bālaṃ dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve nirayādīsu nibbattaṃ ḍahantaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0519a:979_1: yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0519a:979_2: tassa navavidhaṃ mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa tādibhāve ṭhitassa tathārūpassa devāpi pihayanti,
atk-s0519a:979_4: Āhāre satīti āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge appahīne sati.
atk-s0519a:980_1: Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti parito dasapi disā cittena anugantvā.
atk-s0519a:980_5: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassacipi attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena visuṃ visuṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo.
atk-s0519a:980_7: tasmā na hiṃse paraṃ attakāmo attano sukhakāmoti.
atk-s0519a:982_1: suparisuddhāya ca diṭṭhisampattiyā samannāgato piyo piyāyitabbo hoti.
atk-s0519a:984_0: Attano kammakubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
atk-s0519a:985_6: bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
atk-s0519a:986_0: Vattāti “kālena vakkhāmī”tiādipañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ ullumpanabhāve ṭhatvā vattā.
atk-s0519a:986_1: Vacanakkhamoti sabrahmacārīhi yena kenaci vuccamāno subbaco hutvā padakkhiṇaggāhitāya tesaṃ vacanaṃ khamatīti vacanakkhamo.
atk-s0519a:986_3: Vacanakkhamoti dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇento parehi asaṃhīro hutvā tesaṃ pucchāvacanakkhamatāya vacanakkhamo.
atk-s0519a:986_6: Na caṭṭhāne niyojakoti dhammavinayādiṃ adhammāvinayādivasena avatvā dhammavinayādivaseneva dīpanato na ca aṭṭhāne niyojako.
atk-s0519a:987_0: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvāti ettha “taṇhā janeti purisa”nti vacanato tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhā mātā nāma.
atk-s0519a:987_2: rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti pitaraṃ nissāya asmimānassa uppajjanato asmimāno pitā nāma.
atk-s0519a:987_3: Loko viya rājānaṃ yasmā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo bhajanti,
atk-s0519a:987_4: tasmā sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve khattiyā rājāno nāma.
atk-s0519a:987_6: Āyasādhako āyuttakapuriso viya taṃnissito nandirāgo anucaro nāma.
atk-s0519a:988_2: Etena hi taṇhādayo arahattamaggañāṇāsinā hatā bāhitā.
atk-s0519a:988_3: Yātīti so brāhmaṇo niddukkho hutvā yātīti.
atk-s0519a:989_5: Cittepi kāyaṃ samodahatīti yadā sīghaṃ gantukāmo hoti,
atk-s0519a:989_8: Kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvāti “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0519a:989_9: pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā”ti vuttanayena iddhimā kāye sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā paresaṃ
atk-s0519a:989_10: dissamānena kāyena ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīni pekkhamāno cittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0519a:990_1: Yaṃ taṃ lokuttaraṃ ñāṇanti sabbaṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0519a:990_5: Na hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bhagavato sabbasmiṃyeva kāle uppajjatīti sakkā vattunti.
atk-s0519a:991_0: Kittayissāmi te santinti sabbakilesavūpasamahetutāya santiṃ nibbānaṃ dassessāmi.
atk-s0519a:991_3: Anītihanti itihāsāti evaṃ na itikirāya pavattaṃ,
atk-s0519a:991_5: Yaṃ viditvā sato caranti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sato hutvā caranto ariyamaggena yaṃ santiṃ viditvā.
atk-s0519a:991_6: Tare loke visattikanti saṅkhāraloke visappanato visattikasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyya samatikkameyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:992_0: Tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmīti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ santijotakaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi,
atk-s0519a:992_1: taṃ eva vā santiṃ uttamaṃ abhinandāmīti dhotako vadati.
atk-s0519a:992_2: Uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjheti ettha uddhanti anāgataṃ upari ca.
atk-s0519a:992_5: Etaṃ viditvā saṅgotīti etaṃ anāgatādiṃ saṅgajananaṭṭhānanti ñatvā.
atk-s0519a:993_5: Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ceva tumhehi ca.
atk-s0519a:993_6: Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti attho.
atk-s0519a:994_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti paccayehi saṅkharīyantīti “saṅkhārā”ti laddhanāmā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-s0519a:994_1: Ādiantavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato khaṇaparittato ca na niccāti aniccā.
atk-s0519a:994_2: Yadā paññāya passatīti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0519a:994_5: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti yvāyaṃ vuttanayena saccappaṭivedho,
atk-s0519a:994_7: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti sabbe saṅkhārā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena khayaṭṭhena ca dukkhāti.
atk-s0519a:994_9: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā parato tucchato suññato asārato avasavattanato ca anattāti.
atk-s0519a:995_3: Omānopi hi attano avaṅkaraṇamukhenapi saṃpaggaṇhanavaseneva pavattati.
atk-s0519a:995_5: Kimaññatra yathābhūtassa adassanāti sarasapabhaṅgutāya ekanteneva anavaṭṭhitasabhāvehi rūpadhammehi seyyādivasena
atk-s0519a:995_6: attano ukkhipanassa tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanaṃ aññāṇaṃ vinā kiṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ siyā,
atk-s0519a:995_7: aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:996_1: Ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayantīti dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakakilesandhakāraṃ vidhametvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti.
atk-s0519a:996_2: Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya sadevakassapi lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhapaññena sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:996_3: Sudesitānīti saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni.
atk-s0519a:996_4: Kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kāmaṃ devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti,
atk-s0519a:996_5: tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0519a:996_6: tesaṃ niruddhattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti,
atk-s0519a:996_7: sattamabhaveyeva pana vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0519a:997_1: Indakhīloti nagaradvārathirakaraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa
atk-s0519a:997_3: Pathavissito siyāti gambhīranemitāya anto pavisitvā bhūminissito siyā bhaveyya.
atk-s0519a:997_5: Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0519a:997_7: passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati,
atk-s0519a:997_8: taṃ sappurisaṃ uttamapurisaṃ tathā dassanato sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyatāya tathūpamaṃ yathāvuttaindakhīlūpamaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a:998_1: Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa bhagavato saddhammassavanante jātattā ariyasāvako.
atk-s0519a:998_4: Nirayādayo hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato apetattā apāyā.
atk-s0519a:998_7: Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patto adhigatoti sotāpanno.
atk-s0519a:998_8: Akuppadhammatāya maggaphalānaṃ puthujjanabhāvasaṅkhāte virūpe na nipatanasabhāvoti avinipātadhammo.
atk-s0519a:998_10: Uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi avassaṃ pattabbatāya assa paraṃ ayanaṃ gati paṭisaraṇanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0519a:999_3: Pañca sīlāni hi ariyasāvakānaṃ kantāni honti,
atk-s0519a:999_9: Yato sabbesampi sikkhāpadāvirodhena yuttaṭṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ anuññātamevāti.
atk-s0519a:1000_2: Ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti orambhāgiyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyānañca saṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena.
atk-s0519a:1001_1: Anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena adhigatajhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā dasaasubhavasena
atk-s0519a:1002_0: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhā apāyupapattisaṃvattanikāni pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde baddharajjuṃ viya puriso satthena heṭṭhā maggattayena chindeyya.
atk-s0519a:1002_1: Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjuṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya chindeyyevāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1002_2: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya.
atk-s0519a:1002_3: Pañca saṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā bhikkhu “oghatiṇṇo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a:1003_1: amatapadaṃyeva vā ñassāmi jānissāmīti paṭipannassa paṭhamamaggaṭṭhassa indriyanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1003_3: Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānātīti añño,
atk-s0519a:1003_6: upari tīsu maggesu ca ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1003_7: Aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccassa arahato indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1004_4: “Duccintitacintī”tiādīsu duccintitaṃ abhijjhaṃ byāpādaṃ micchādassanañca cintetīti duccintitacintī.
atk-s0519a:1005_7: Puna kiñci kātuṃ vattuṃ vā asamatthaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1006_1: Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati,
atk-s0519a:1006_2: tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññāmīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1007_1: Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā naṃ maññati.
atk-s0519a:1007_3: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyūthe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento tiṭṭhati yāva na eko palāyati,
atk-s0519a:1007_5: atha taṃ palāyīnaṃ sabbo gogaṇo bhiyyo ajjhottharati,
atk-s0519a:1007_6: evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1008_1: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakatthaparamesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati.
atk-s0519a:1008_2: Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā titikkhati,
atk-s0519a:1008_7: na taṃ balanti āhu kathenti dīpenti.
atk-s0519a:1008_8: Dhammaguttassāti dhammena rakkhitassa dhammaṃ vā rakkhantassa.
atk-s0519a:1008_10: paṭipparitvā vā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadeyyāsi.
atk-s0519a:1008_11: Dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1008_12: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:1008_19: Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “bālo aya”nti andhabālaputhujjanā evaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0519a:1008_20: Ye dhammassa akovidāti ye catusaccadhamme akovidā acchekā,
atk-s0519a:1009_1: Pattanti adhigataṃ etarahi anubhuyyamānaṃ kāmūpakaraṇaṃ pattabbanti tadeva anāgate adhigantabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1009_5: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti ye yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlavatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā ṭhitā. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:1009_14: Etehi eva saṃsārasuddhīti tāni sārato gahetvā ṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1010_0: Iccete ubho antāti iti sīlabbataparāmāsamukhena attakilamathānuyogo,
atk-s0519a:1010_1: kāmesu anavajjasaññitāmukhena kāmasukhallikānuyogo cāti ete ubho antā.
atk-s0519a:1010_2: Te ca kho yathākkamaṃ āyatiṃ pattabbe,
atk-s0519a:1010_3: etarahi patte ca rāgarajādiokiṇṇe kāmaguṇe allīnehi kilesāturānaṃ anusikkhantehi,
atk-s0519a:1010_5: tato eva ca te kaṭasivaḍḍhanā aparāparaṃ jarāmaraṇehi sivathikāya vaḍḍhanasīlā ekanteneva kaṭasiṃ vaḍḍhenti,
atk-s0519a:1010_6: sayaṃ vaḍḍhantā pare ca antadvaye samādapentā vaḍḍhāpenti cāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1011_0: Ubho ante anabhiññāyāti yathāvutte ubho ante ajānitvā.
atk-s0519a:1011_1: Olīyanti eketi “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti olīyanataṇhābhinivesavasena avalīyanti ekacce.
atk-s0519a:1011_3: “ucchijjati vinassati attā ca loko cā”ti atidhāvanābhinivesavasena atikkamanti.
atk-s0519a:1012_1: Tato eva anupādāparinibbānato tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ paññāpanāya natthīti.
atk-s0519a:1013_4: Kiñhi tassa sakaṃ hotīti tassa maccumukhaṃ pavisantassa sattassa kiṃ aññaṃ sakaṃ nāma aññatra kalyāṇakammato.
atk-s0519a:1014_1: Ime dhammāti ime kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā.
atk-s0519a:1014_3: Idaṃ phalanti idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ aniṭṭhavipākañca phalaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1015_0: Ākaṅkhato na jāneyyunti tattha yena hetunā bhagavato yā ākaṅkhā,
atk-s0519a:1017_0: Tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ mahānubhāvatā na sabbathā aññesaṃ visayo,
atk-s0519a:1017_7: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-s0519a:1017_8: Katamā pubbā koṭīti avisajjanīyanti “katamā pubbā koṭī”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avisajjanīyaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a:1017_15: Na paññāyatīti aññassa ñāṇavisayo na hotīti pana atthaṃ sandhāya “na paññāyatīti sāvakānaṃ ñāṇavekallenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1017_16: Tattha attūpanāyikāti attā upanetabbo etissāti attūpanāyikā.
atk-s0519a:1017_17: Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati,
atk-s0519a:1018_1: taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti bhagavato sabbattha appaṭihataññāṇataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā
atk-s0519a:1018_5: padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ evamāhāti.
atk-s0519a:1018_9: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ “ettakāni vassānī”ti vā “ettakāni vassasatānī”ti vā “ettakāni vassasahassānī”ti vā “ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vāti.
atk-s0519a:1018_15: Tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya.
atk-s0519a:1018_17: vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya,
atk-s0519a:1019_0: Tattha vīsatikhārikoti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti.
atk-s0519a:1019_7: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi,
atk-s0519a:1019_8: avīcimhi eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0519a:1020_11: Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattena kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0519a:1021_3: Kena kāraṇena kena hetunā kāya paṭipattiyā jinoti pucchati.
atk-s0519a:1021_4: Kathanti pana kena pakārena kiṃ atītānaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1021_5: udāhu anāgatānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānena jinoti pucchati,
atk-s0519a:1021_8: udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ jino.
