atk-s0519a:1022_3: Rūpaṃ tathāgatoti rūpaṃ attāti sakkāyadiṭṭhivasena pucchatīti katvā vuttaṃ “avisajjanīya”nti.
atk-s0519a:1023_12: bālassāti tasmiṃ upaṭṭhahanākāre bālassa evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:1024_6: Khaṇo vo paṭiladdhoti aṭṭhaakkhaṇavajjito navamoyaṃ khaṇo paṭiladdho maggabrahmacariyavāsāya.
atk-s0519a:1025_1: Yahiṃ yahinti yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ yo gacchati.
atk-s0519a:1025_2: So naṃ adhammoti yo adhammo tena carito,
atk-s0519a:1027_3: Pāṇātipātādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalaṃ na kayirā,
atk-s0519a:1027_5: Evaṃ visodhento hi sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esakehi buddhādīhi isīhi paveditaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ārādheyyāti.
atk-s0519a:1027_6: Dukkaṭanti kāyena vācāya manasā ca dukkaṭaṃ sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ yassa natthi.
atk-s0519a:1027_7: Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehīti etehi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pavesanivāraṇato pihitaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1028_1: Gihī vāpi jātito paṭṭhāya dasa akusalakammapathe karonto,
atk-s0519a:1028_2: pabbajito vāpi upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya garukāpattiṃ āpajjamāno accantadussīlo nāma.
atk-s0519a:1028_3: Idha pana yo dvīsu tīsu attabhāvesu dussīlo,
atk-s0519a:1028_4: tassa gatiyā āgataṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1028_5: Dussīlabhāvoti cettha dussīlassa cha dvārāni nissāya uppannā taṇhā veditabbā.
atk-s0519a:1028_6: Māluvā sālamivotthatanti yassa puggalassa taṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1028_7: Yathā nāma māluvā sālaṃ otthataṃ deve vassante pattehi udakaṃ paṭicchitvā saṃbhañjanavasena sabbatthakameva pariyonandhati,
atk-s0519a:1028_8: evaṃ attabhāvaṃ otthataṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ so māluvāya saṃbhañjitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātiyamāno rukkho viya
atk-s0519a:1028_9: tāya dussīlyasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya saṃbhañjitvā apāyesu pātiyamāno,
atk-s0519a:1029_1: yathā pāsāṇamayaṃ pāsāṇasambhavaṃ vajiraṃ tameva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ attano uṭṭhānaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ
atk-s0519a:1029_2: khāyitvā chiddāchiddaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā aparibhogaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a:1029_3: evamevaṃ attanā kataṃ attani jātaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ nippaññaṃ puggalaṃ catūsu apāyesu abhimatthati kantati viddhaṃsetīti.
atk-s0519a:1030_3: Khayā ca kammassāti kammakkhayakarañāṇena kammassa khepanato.
atk-s0519a:1030_5: Nibbanti te jotirivindhanakkhayāti yathā nāma anupādāno jātavedo nibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1031_1: “Yathāpi bhamaro”ti gāthāyaṃ bhamaroti yā kāci madhukarajāti.
atk-s0519a:1031_2: Pupphanti pupphārāme caranto pupphañca tassa vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayaṃ aheṭhayanto avināsento caratīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1031_3: Evaṃ caritvā ca paleti rasamādāyāti yāvadatthaṃ rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya rasaṃ gahetvā ḍeti.
atk-s0519a:1031_4: So ekaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā rukkhasusirādīsu taṃ rajamissakaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā anupubbena madhurarasaṃ madhuṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a:1031_5: na tassa pupphārāme caritapaccayā pupphaṃ vā tassa vaṇṇo vā gandho vā vinassati,
atk-s0519a:1031_7: Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekkho asekkho vā anagāriyamuni kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ gaṇhanto careyyāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1031_8: Na hi tassa gāme caraṇapaccayā saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni vā hoti,
atk-s0519a:1031_10: Evaṃ caritvā ca pana gāmato nikkhamitvā bahigāme udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā nisinno akkhabhañjana-
atk-s0519a:1031_11: vaṇalepanaputtamaṃsūpamavasena paccavekkhanto piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā tathārūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ anupavisitvā
atk-s0519a:1032_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati,
atk-s0519a:1032_1: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho.
atk-s0519a:1032_2: So eva kāyikavācasikassa vītikkamassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaro.
atk-s0519a:1032_3: Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgato hutvā sabbiriyāpathesu carati.
atk-s0519a:1032_4: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0519a:1032_8: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti sikkhāpadesu yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1033_1: kusalena parisuddhājīvoti ettha ācāragocaraggahaṇeneva kusale kāyakamme vacīkamme ca gahitepi yasmā idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ na ākāsādīsu uppajjati,
atk-s0519a:1033_11: parisuddhaṃ ājīvampi kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0519a:1033_12: Āraddhavīriyoti yassa kāyikaṃ cetasikañca vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0519a:1033_14: Tattha yo gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭhaārambhavatthuvasena ekako hoti,
atk-s0519a:1033_15: tassa kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1033_16: Yo cittasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ekako hoti,
atk-s0519a:1033_17: gamanādīsu uppannakilesaṃ uppannaṭṭhāneyeva niggaṇhitvā jhānaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0519a:1033_18: tassa cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1033_24: paccakkhakaraṇatthañca dhuraṃ anikkhipitvā vīriyaṃ ussukkāpento viharati.
atk-s0519a:1033_25: Paññavāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayapariggāhikāya paññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0519a:1034_0: Natthi puttasamaṃ pemanti mātāpitaro virūpepi attano puttake suvaṇṇabimbakaṃ viya maññanti mālāguḷe viya sīsādīsu katvā pariharamānā.
atk-s0519a:1034_1: Tehi uhaditāpi omuttitāpi gandhavilepanaṃ paṭicchantā viya somanassaṃ āpajjanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0519a:1034_3: Puttapemena samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:1034_4: Gosamitanti gohi samaṃ godhanasadisaṃ aññaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1034_5: Sūriyasamā ābhāti sūriyābhāya samā aññā ābhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1034_6: Samuddaparamāti ye keci aññe sarā nāma,
atk-s0519a:1034_9: samuddasadisaṃ aññaṃ udakaṃ nidānaṃ nāma natthi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0519a:1035_0: Yasmā pana attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ natthi.
atk-s0519a:1035_1: Mātāpitaro hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītaro aposetvā attānameva posenti.
atk-s0519a:1035_2: Dhaññena ca samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1035_3: Tathārūpe hi kāle hiraññasuvaṇṇādīnipi gomahiṃsādīnipi dhaññaggahaṇatthaṃ dhaññasāmikānameva santikaṃ gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0519a:1035_4: Paññāya ca samā ābhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1035_7: paññā pana dasasahassimpi lokadhātuṃ ekapajjotaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0519a:1035_9: Meghavuṭṭhiyā ca samo saro nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1035_10: Nadī vā hi hotu taḷākādīni vā,
atk-s0519a:1035_12: Meghavuṭṭhiyā hi pacchinnāya mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0519a:1035_13: vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanāpi ekodakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0519a:1035_14: Tasmā bhagavā devatāvacanaṃ paṭikkhipanavasena paṭigāthaṃ vadanto “natthi attasamaṃ pema”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a:1036_2: Maggo canekāyatano pavuttoti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasena anekehi kāraṇehi maggo kathito,
atk-s0519a:1036_3: evaṃ sante kissa bhītā hutvā ayaṃ janatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo aggahesīti vadati.
atk-s0519a:1036_5: Paralokaṃ na bhāyeti imasmā lokā paralokaṃ gacchanto na bhāyeyya.
atk-s0519a:1037_1: Gharamāvasantoti anāthapiṇḍikādayo viya bahvannapāne ghare vasanto.
atk-s0519a:1037_2: Saṃvibhāgīti accharāya gahitampi nakhena phāletvā parassa datvāva bhuñjanasīlo.
atk-s0519a:1037_5: Ettha ca vācanti cattāri vacīsucaritāni gahitāni.
atk-s0519a:1037_13: vadaññūti ekanti imāni cattāri aṅgāni sandhāya “etesu dhammesu ṭhito catūsū”ti āha.
atk-s0519a:1039_4: “saṃvibhāgī vadaññū”ti ekanti etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito dhamme ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1040_4: Sīlakathā ca nāmesā kammapathavasena vā paṇṇattivasena vā kathetabbā.
atk-s0519a:1040_5: Tattha kammapathavasena tāva kathentena asevitabbakāyasamācāro pāṇātipātādinnādānamicchācārehi kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1040_7: Sevitabbakāyasamācāro pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīhi ceva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1041_0: Asevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādivacīduccaritena ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1041_1: Sevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādiveramaṇīhi ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0519a:1042_1: sā kāyavacīsamācāraggahaṇena gahitāpi yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma etasmiṃyeva dvāradvaye uppajjati, na ākāse,
atk-s0519a:1042_10: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesatī”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:1042_15: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā ajātaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesatī”tiādi.
atk-s0519a:1043_1: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti jaṅghamaggādayo vā hontu dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatamaggā vā,
atk-s0519a:1043_2: sabbesampi maggānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahānakaro
atk-s0519a:1043_3: nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsupi saccesu dukkhaparijānanādikiccaṃ sādhayamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo.
atk-s0519a:1043_4: Saccānaṃ caturo padāti “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”ti āgataṃ vacīsaccaṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0519a:1043_8: “ekañhi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthī”ti vuttaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ vā hotu.
atk-s0519a:1043_9: Sabbesampi imesaṃ saccānaṃ parijānitabbaṭṭhena pahātabbaṭṭhena sacchikātabbaṭṭhena bhāvetabbaṭṭhena ekapaṭivedhaṭṭhena
atk-s0519a:1043_10: tathapaṭivedhaṭṭhena ca “dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādayo caturo padā seṭṭhā nāma.
atk-s0519a:1043_14: virāgo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vacanato nibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo sabbadhammānaṃ seṭṭho.
atk-s0519a:1043_15: Dvipadānañca cakkhumāti sabbesampi devamanussādibhedānaṃ dvipadānaṃ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā bhagavāva seṭṭhoti.
atk-s0519a:1044_9: Aggamakkhāyatīti guṇehi aggo uttamo seṭṭho akkhāyati.
atk-s0519a:1045_3: sabbe rāgamadādayo madā nimmadā honti abhāvaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0519a:1046_0: Dhammo ca kusalakkhatoti tassa satthuno dhammo ca kusalo anavajjo,
atk-s0519a:1046_1: anavajjattā eva paṭipakkhehi rāgādīhi kilesehi sabbatitthiyavādehi ca aparikkhato.
atk-s0519a:1046_2: Tāni tīṇi visissareti etāni tīṇi ratanāni loke sabbaratanehi visissanti guṇavasena sabbalokaṃ atisentīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1047_0: Samaṇapadumasañcayo gaṇoti padumasadisānaṃ ariyasamaṇānaṃ samūhasaṅkhāto gaṇo.
atk-s0519a:1047_2: Ariyapuggalā ca sabbathāpi paripuṇṇaguṇāti padumasadisā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:1047_4: Naravaradamakoti naravaro ca purisānaṃ damako nāyako cāti attho.
atk-s0519a:1048_2: Sabbābhibhūti sabbalokaṃ attano guṇehi abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0519a:1048_3: Saccadhammoti vaṭṭato ekantanissaraṇabhāvena avitatho saha pariyattiyā navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0519a:1048_4: tato eva natthañño tassa uttarīti tassa uttari adhikaguṇo añño ca dhammo natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a:1048_5: Ariyasaṅghova niccaṃ sabbakālaṃ vidūhi sabbapaṇḍitehi pūjito.
atk-s0519a:1049_0: “Ekāyana”nti gāthāya ekāyananti ekaṃ maggaṃ. Maggassa hi –
atk-s0519a:1051_0: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅgamo”ti. –
atk-s0519a:1052_5: Gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena pavivittena paṭipajjitabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a:1052_8: Ekassa vā sabbasattaseṭṭhassa bhagavato ayanoti ekāyano.
atk-s0519a:1052_19: Api ca pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanāya pavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva ayati gacchatīti ekāyano,
atk-s0519a:1053_5: vuttappakāraṃ ekāyanasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ sayambhuñāṇena bhagavā pajānāti,
atk-s0519a:1053_6: jānanto ca tena tena hitena satte anukampatīti.
atk-s0519a:1053_8: tīsupi kālesu ekantaniyyānatañca vibhāvetuṃ “etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe,
atk-s0519a:1053_9: tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti āha.
atk-s0519a:1054_0: Evaṃ duvidhampi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttapadāni udāharantena vibhajitvā idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi saṃsanditvā
atk-s0519a:1054_2: Tattha dassanabhāgiyena ca bhāvanābhāgiyena cāti nibbedhabhāgiyena.
atk-s0519a:1054_3: Nibbedhabhāgiyameva hi dassanabhāgiyaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyanti dvidhā bhinditvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1054_5: saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi dassanabhāgiyādīhi cāti ubhayehi niddisitabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a:1055_0: Evaṃ lokiyattikassa saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi catūhi padehi saṃsandanaṃ dassetvā iminā nayena sesatikānaṃ
atk-s0519a:1055_1: sesapadānañca saṃsandanaṃ suviññeyyanti taṃ anuddharitvā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ samatikkamanaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0519a:1055_5: Tathāpi lokuttarasuttāni viya lokiyasuttānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa samatikkamāya
atk-s0519a:1055_6: hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa suttassa nigghātāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1055_9: Yasmā ca vodānadhammā viya saṃkilesadhammānaṃ dassanabhūmisamatikkamaneneva bhāvanābhūmi adhigantabbā,
atk-s0519a:1055_10: tasmā “bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1055_11: Yasmā pana asekkhadhammesu uppannesu maggabhāvanākiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a:1056_1: Ekabījinātiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1057_1: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0519a:1057_2: So ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a:1058_0: Yo pana dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0519a:1059_2: So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a:1060_1: Dve vā tīṇi vāti idamettha desanāmattameva.
atk-s0519a:1060_2: Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi kolaṃkolo hoti eva.
atk-s0519a:1061_0: Yo pana satta bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a:1062_2: So sattakkhattuṃ deve ceva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0519a:1063_0: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
atk-s0519a:1063_5: Tattha pubbahetu niyametīti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1063_6: Upari tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannāti āpajjati.
atk-s0519a:1063_7: Paṭhamamaggo niyametīti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
atk-s0519a:1063_8: Upari tayo maggā niyamentīti vāde “paṭhamamagge anuppanne eva upari tayo maggā uppannā”ti āpajjati.
atk-s0519a:1063_10: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0519a:1063_14: Ettha ca yo manussesu eva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1063_15: yo ca devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1063_18: kālena manussesūti vomissakanayena saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1063_21: Vaṭṭajjhāsayo hi ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissati.
atk-s0519a:1064_0: Tattha yo saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0519a:1064_2: Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto nāma hutvā vuttanayena ekabījiādibhedo hoti.
atk-s0519a:1064_3: Yo pana paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0519a:1064_5: Phalakkhaṇe pana diṭṭhippatto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedo hoti.
atk-s0519a:1064_6: Idañca aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ alābhino vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1064_7: Lābhī pana phalakkhaṇe kāyasakkhī nāma hoti.
atk-s0519a:1065_7: Tattha hi yo avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ appatvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1065_9: Yo pana āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1065_11: Tathā yo avihādīsu upapanno asaṅkhārena appayogena arahattaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0519a:1065_13: Yo pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0519a:1065_15: Uddhaṃ uparūpari brahmaloke upapattisoto etassāti uddhaṃsoto.
atk-s0519a:1066_0: Tattha atthi uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī,
atk-s0519a:1066_1: atthi na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti.
atk-s0519a:1066_2: Tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0519a:1066_4: Yo pana avihādīsu nibbatto tattheva aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparūpari brahmaloke parinibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1066_8: Yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1066_9: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0519a:1067_0: Navahi puggalehīti ettha aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ alābhī arahā paññāvimutto nāma.
atk-s0519a:1067_1: Tesaṃ pana lābhī vikkhambhanasamucchedavimokkhavasena ubhohi bhāgehi rūpakāyanāmakāyasaṅkhātato ubhato bhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma.
atk-s0519a:1068_0: Tatra yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyāpathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0519a:1068_3: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0519a:1068_17: saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodhoti terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati,
atk-s0519a:1068_19: Tattha avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0519a:1068_23: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0519a:1069_6: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
atk-s0519a:1069_7: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma.
atk-s0519a:1069_10: Evaṃ suññatavimuttādayo tayo saddhāvimutto paññāvimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto samasīsīti satta sāvakā arahanto,
atk-s0519a:1069_12: sammāsambuddhoti imehi navahi puggalehi asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1071_0: Vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1071_1: Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañhi suttaṃ rāgacaritehi puggalehi niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1071_9: sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ pakatisīlavantādivasena veditabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “sīlavantehi niddisitabba”nti vatvā “pakatisīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1071_10: Taṃ pakatisīlādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1071_12: Tesampi vā ettheva saṅgahetvā dassanatthaṃ “pañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1072_2: Ñāṇaṃ paññāya niddisitabbanti yasmiṃ sutte paññā āgatā,
atk-s0519a:1072_5: atha kho paññindriyādipariyāyenapi yattha paññā āgatā,
atk-s0519a:1072_6: taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti dassetuṃ “paññindriyenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1072_9: Yaṃ vā panātiādīsu yaṃ vā aññaṃ kiñci paññāya adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1072_10: Sabbaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci sutte āgataṃ,
atk-s0519a:1073_2: taṃ suttaṃ tehi āyatanehi ñāṇaṃ ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1073_3: Paññāpi ārammaṇabhūtā ñeyyanti ñeyyato visuṃ katvā paññā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:1073_4: Tathā hi paññā ñāṇantarassa ārammaṇanti katthaci sutte ñeyyabhāvenapi vuccati.
atk-s0519a:1073_5: Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇabhūtanti yaṃ kiñci ñāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ rūpādi.
atk-s0519a:1073_8: Sabbaṃ taṃ saṅkhatena asaṅkhatena cāti sabbaṃ taṃ yathāsambhavaṃ saṅkhatabhāvena asaṅkhatabhāvena ca ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1074_0: Yaṃ vā pana kiñci bhagavā aññataravacanaṃ bhāsatīti lokiyalokuttarādisuttesu ekasmiṃ sutte dve.
atk-s0519a:1074_1: Tesu yaṃ vā pana kiñci aññataravacanaṃ ekasseva kathanaṃ bhāsati niddisati.
atk-s0519a:1074_2: Sabbaṃ taṃ yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ dhārayitabbanti taṃ yathā sabbaṃ suttaṃ lokiyādīsu yadi aññataravasena,
atk-s0519a:1075_1: na itaranti vuttaṃ “duvidho hetu yañca kammaṃ ye ca kilesā”ti.
atk-s0519a:1075_2: Samudayo kilesāti ettha “samudayo”ti etena samudayapakkhiyā vuttā.
atk-s0519a:1075_10: Paṭikkhittakāraṇenāti yena kāraṇena bhagavatā yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1076_0: Ettha ca yathā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggato anekavidho paṭṭhānabhedo icchito,
atk-s0519a:1076_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi ekadesadassanavasena āgatattā nayadassananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0519a:1076_3: Sakkā hi iminā nayena viññunā te niddhāretunti.
atk-s0519a:1076_4: Yathā ca saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ lokiyādīnañca visuṃ visuṃ saṃsaggabhedavasena ayaṃ paṭṭhānabhedo anekavidho labbhati,
atk-s0519a:1076_5: evaṃ ubhayesampi saṃsaggavasena ayaṃ nayo yathārahaṃ labbhateva.
atk-s0519a:1076_6: Labbhati hi lokiyaṃ suttaṃ kiñci saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ,
atk-s0519a:1077_0: Evaṃ soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ pakkhipitvā,
atk-s0519a:1077_1: aṭṭhavīsatividhe ca paṭṭhāne soḷasavidhaṃ pakkhipitvā yathārahaṃ dukatikādibhedena sambhavato paṭṭhānavibhāgo veditabbo,
atk-s0519a:1077_2: so ca kho tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassa suttapadassa vasena.
atk-s0519a:1077_3: Yasmā pana tāni tāni suttapadāni udāharaṇavasena niddhāretvā imasmiṃ atthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco hoti,
atk-s0519a:1077_5: sakkā ca iminā nayena viññunā ayamattho viññātuṃ,
atk-s0519a:1077_7: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ aññamaññasaṃsaggavasena paṭṭhānavibhāgo ekadeseneva dassito,
atk-s0519a:1091_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0519a:1096_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
